name: Maha
description: The Maha is a medium fiend with high Dexterity and impressive physical attributes, featuring a chaotic appearance accentuated by its Frozen Aura.
memorable: Its ability to incapacitate opponents with deadly laughter and manipulate the battlefield makes the Maha a significant threat.
goals: To control the battlefield and incapacitate enemies through psychic laughter.
relations: May be encountered alongside other chaotic and evil fiends.
environment: Often found in icy or chaotic terrains where it can utilize snow camouflage.
strengths: Resilient with high Dexterity and strong Constitution, capable of evading magical control due to Magic Resistance.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence may hinder its strategic decision-making; vulnerable to nonmagical attacks in particular situations.
attacks: Employs a multiattack of claws dealing piercing and cold damage, and can incapacitate with a psychic barrage.
most_powerful_ability: Deadly Laughter, which deals heavy psychic damage and incapacitates creatures with fits of uncontrollable laughter.
senses: Possesses truesight within 120 feet, allowing it to detect invisible creatures and objects.
skills: Has a +3 modifier in perception, making it capable of detecting hidden threats.
additional_information: Immunities to cold and poison damage
Resistance to fire and lightning damage
Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks in snowy terrain
Ability to communicate telepathically up to 120 feet
Low Intelligence indicates poor strategic awareness
